snippet: Businesses that exceed their allowances of greenhouse gas emissions would be able to buy excess allowances from companies across the border.
abstract: California and Quebec move closer to an agreement for cross-border trading of carbon permits, which industries must acquire to cover their emissions of greenhouse gases.
lead_paragraph: Businesses that exceed their allowances of greenhouse gas emissions would be able to buy excess allowances from companies across the border.

headline.seo: California and Quebec Near Cross-Border Trading of Emissions Permits
headline.main: California and Quebec Near an Agreement for Trading of Carbon Permits
headline.print_headline: California and Quebec Near an Agreement for Trading of Carbon Permits
